overview.en: MDN is proposed by Tim Buberl, a professor of mathematics and doctor of computer science at the University of California, as CEO, together with his team Eternal. MDN is the product of the natural decentralization of the reductive block chain.Project. MDN Focus Chain Infrastructure and Point-to-Point Core Technology, with fully distributed anonymous P2P Internet communication consulting, collective formal mechanism to solve complex transactions, anonymous protection transactions, asset issuance and other characteristics, make cross-communication, multi-chain integration.Magical Daring Neola's vision is to achieve anonymity of all-round value systems such as payment, communication, transaction and assets, break through key technologies of value transmission network, build global value internet, and provide basic network for all kinds of value transmission applications.
overview.zh: MDN是由加州大学计算机专业博士，数学教授Tim Buberl任CEO，与其团队Eternal共同提出，MDN是还原区块链本生去 中心化的目的而出现的产物。MDN聚焦链基础设施和点对点的核心技术，具有全分布式匿名 P2P互联网通信咨询，解决复杂交易的集体正式机制， 匿名保护交易，资产发行等特点，使得交叉沟通，多链融合。Magical Daring Neola 的愿景是实现支付、通信、交易、资产等全方位价值体系的匿名化，突破价值传输网络各类关键技术，构建 全球价值互联网，为各类价值传输应用提供基础网络。
